main event: An unidentified egg-shaped object with a tail was observed in the sky in Alberta Province, Canada on November 17, 1948.
interesting points: The object was described as flaming orange in color,It appeared to be in a shallow dive,The observation lasted for a momentary duration,The object was sighted approximately 15,000 feet high,There were two confirmed witnesses to the sighting.
sighted object: an egg-shaped object with a tail
witness description: 1st Lt. James Toomey and S/Sgt Onno C. Blink, Radio Operators
